KiiiKiii

Introduction

Kya is a South Korean singer and model under Starship Entertainment. She is the lead vocalist, lead rapper and maknae of the girl group KiiiKiii, with whom she officially debuted on March 24, 2025 with the release of their first mini album "UNCUT GEM".

Prior to her debut, Kya worked as a child model and fashion content creator for kids and teenagers.
